mil5.2.2:5.2: ‘natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhī’ti, puna ca therena mālukyaputtena pañhaṃ puṭṭho na byākāsi.
mil5.2.2:5.3: Eso kho, bhante nāgasena, pañho dvayanto ekantanissito bhavissati ajānanena vā guyhakaraṇena vā.
mil5.2.2:5.5: ‘natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhī’ti, tena hi therassa mālukyaputtassa ajānantena na byākataṃ.
mil5.2.2:5.6: Yadi jānantena na byākataṃ, tena hi atthi tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhi.
mil5.2.2:5.7: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.2.2:6.1: “Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhī’ti, abyākato ca therena mālukyaputtena pucchito pañho, tañca pana na ajānantena na guyhakaraṇena.
mil5.2.2:6.4: Ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho ṭhapanīyo pañhoti.
mil5.2.2:7.8: ‘viññāṇaṃ aniccan’ti ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo pañho, ayaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyo pañho.
mil5.2.2:8.2: ‘Aniccaṃ pana rūpan’ti vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho, ‘aniccā pana vedanā’ti … pe …
mil5.2.2:8.8: ‘aniccaṃ pana viññāṇan’ti vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho, ayaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo pañho.
mil5.2.2:9.2: ‘Kiṃ nu kho cakkhunā sabbaṃ vijānātī’ti ayaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo pañho.
mil5.2.2:10.2: ‘Sassato loko’ti ṭhapanīyo pañho, ‘asassato loko’ti, ‘antavā loko’ti, ‘anantavā loko’ti, ‘antavā ca anantavā ca loko’ti, ‘nevantavā nānantavā loko’ti, ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’ti, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’ti, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti ṭhapanīyo pañho, ayaṃ ṭhapanīyo pañho.
mil5.2.2:11.1: Bhagavā, mahārāja, therassa mālukyaputtassa taṃ ṭhapanīyaṃ pañhaṃ na byākāsi.
mil5.2.2:11.3: Na tassa dīpanāya hetu vā kāraṇaṃ vā atthi, tasmā so pañho ṭhapanīyo.
